help.description: This shows all Comands and how to use them. To get more info, use this command with a command or a category.

actions.description: Responds by greeting the user. no extra actions needed.
shows Information about Izzy's pages, including some hidden stuff.

categories.description: Commands that allow gif based interactions between server members.
Commands that allow relationships between server members.
useful bot commands to manage certain things and get info about stuff.
All the commands related to administration. Only Developers and Moderators can use this
commands that have no purpose but fun itself.

utility.description: Commands that can be used to get info and tools to make stuff easier

actions.description: shows information about the Chats on the Server.

admin.description: All the commands for bot and server administration

actions.dscription: a command to add or remove a limit from a command or all commands

actions.description: Gets a random Inspirational Image Quote from Inspirobot.
creates a 10x10 grid of 'pop' spoilers where one may be replaced with nut or uwu
